explains: vt. 先发制人，预先阻止；垄断，屯积；领先；占先一步

sentences.en: Try to anticipate what your child will do and forestall problems.
sentences.cn: 尽量预见你的孩子会干什么，并预先阻止问题发生。

sentences.en: To forestall is better than to amend.; Prevention is better than cure.
sentences.cn: 与其补救于已然，不如防范于未然。

sentences.en: We must act now to forestall disaster.
sentences.cn: 我们现在必须采取行动以防灾难。
